    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fleeting Shadow](/Feats.aspx?ID=6397) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 212 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=261), [Verduran Shadow](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=312) (Level 6)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6394)

</column>

---

You're able to quickly disappear and then move about without drawing the attention of your enemies. You [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=2404), then [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405) twice.
name: Fleeting Shadow
